blockPress.articleTitle: Accelerating the Future of Intelligent Enterprise in the heart of Silicon Valley

articleSummary.articleSummary: On March 8th, the SAP.iO Foundry in San Francisco announced its 2018 Spring Cohort, comprised of 10 innovative enterprise software startups building the future of the Intelligent Enterprise.

blockPress.articleTitle: Blockchain company Centrifuge wants every business to get paid on time

articleSummary.articleSummary: The co-founders behind Centrifuge have previously created an essential company with Taulia. Now, they want to do it again, but on the blockchain.

Blockchain technology will democratise trade finance by opening access to thousands of small businesses – if trade wars don’t get in the way,  says co-founder of Taulia and CEO of Centrifuge, Maex Ament.

content.value: Centrifuge and Dharma hosted an evening to showcase the integration of their systems to enable an open, decentralized financial system. Centrifuge is enabling its users to tokenize off-chain documents and register them on the blockchain while maintaining privacy of the underlying data. Integrating with Dharma allows businesses to use these tokenized assets to access better, decentralized funding through Dharma's flexible underwriting and relaying protocols.
